cards.name: Glock 77
cards.description: Old Austrian model, overengineered to perfection and back. Light recoil and just enough stopping power to suit anyone's needs.

cards.name: Mare's Handcannon
cards.description: Weighty halfbreed of pistol and lever rifle. Hold it very steady, and even farther away from that pretty face o' yours.

cards.name: Twelve-eyed Gouger
cards.description: Despite the overly dramatic flair of its name, it's but a ten gauge shotgun. Experienced shooters will know that's terrifying enough, though.

cards.name: Ammunition
cards.description: An old stash of standard-issue ammo. Wrapped in damp cloth and surprisingly well-kept for its age. These'll work just fine.
